nextSession.title: Chapter 2 - Basic Training
nextSession.description: After completing orientation at the Spelljammer Academy it is time to start basic training.

events.value: Cloud sent a sock of honey north
Jill of the Jungle was preserved.
Cassandra gained 1 Dexterity and Timagast gained 1 Constitution

nextSession.title: Chapter 26 - First steps into Thither
nextSession.description: After fleeing in hot air balloons, the group finds themselves at the edge of Thither.

nextSession.title: Chapter 47 - The Final Showdown
nextSession.description: Madam Eva's card reading into fruition. It is time to smite the wretched king of Barovia, Strahd von Zarovich.
